医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的基因研究表明失眠与卵巢癌风险和死亡率较高有关研究人员发现失眠与上皮性卵巢癌（EOC）风险和死亡率增加之间存在显着的遗传联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Insomnia-linked-to-higher-ovarian-cancer-risk-and-mortality-in-new-genic-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Insomnia-linked-to-higher-ovarian-cancer-risk-and-mortality-in-new-genic-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b062cdbd-eefe-44b6-893f-875deb2158fd Tue, 04 Jun 2024 23:53:00 -0400 Insomnia linked to higher ovarian cancer risk and mortality in new genetic study
墨西哥湾沿岸研究揭示阳光对心理健康的惊人影响较高的太阳辐射水平可能会减少墨西哥湾沿岸居民的心理困扰，但不会减少抑郁症，其影响因季节、年龄和性别而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Gulf-Coast-study-uncovers-the-surprising-effects-of-sunshine-on-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Gulf-Coast-study-uncovers-the-surprising-effects-of-sunshine-on-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1156c8b-bc31-4050-9f73-fec1d40405e1 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 23:44:00 -0400 Gulf Coast study uncovers the surprising effects of sunshine on mental health
研究发现，适合怀孕的地中海饮食可改善孕产妇健康《美国临床营养学杂志》最近的一项研究验证了 17 项妊娠适应地中海饮食评分 (preg-MEDAS)，发现它可以改善母亲的心脏代谢健康，而不会显着影响新生儿结局。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Pregnancy-adapted-Mediterranean-diet-improves-maternal-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Pregnancy-adapted-Mediterranean-diet-improves-maternal-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1856bfb9-a6d8-4469-9344-41c89d84b1ba Tue, 04 Jun 2024 23:20:00 -0400 Pregnancy-adapted Mediterranean diet improves maternal health, study finds
研究揭示光对新陈代谢的影响超越昼夜节律最近的《自然代谢》评论强调了光照或剥夺如何通过非昼夜节律途径影响代谢活动，例如产热和葡萄糖稳态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Research-reveals-lights-impact-on-metabolism-beyond-circadian-rhythms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Research-reveals-lights-impact-on-metabolism-beyond-circadian-rhythms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe9ca23f-cff3-41d6-8ec1-980e07b66774 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 23:01:00 -0400 Research reveals light's impact on metabolism beyond circadian rhythms
审查发现，传统饮食具有重要的健康益处和政策影响《营养进展》最近发表的一篇评论研究了传统拉丁美洲、亚洲和非洲饮食如何影响饮食质量和健康指标，强调其相对于加工食品的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Heritage-diets-have-important-health-benefits-and-policy-implications-review-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Heritage-diets-have-important-health-benefits-and-policy-implications-review-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad7c0d66-6551-4dce-82c4-286c84d0efb9 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 22:27:00 -0400 Heritage diets have important health benefits and policy implications, review finds
研究发现TMAO水平升高与糖尿病风险增加有关最近的一项营养研究将三甲胺 N-氧化物 (TMAO) 水平升高与 2 型糖尿病风险增加联系起来，强调了饮食在预防糖尿病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Elevated-TMAO-levels-linked-to-higher-diabetes-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Elevated-TMAO-levels-linked-to-higher-diabetes-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0be8fcf-7125-48b4-a4d8-6e4d1f0f7215 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 20:51:00 -0400 Elevated TMAO levels linked to higher diabetes risk, study finds
适量摄入胆碱可降低心脏病风险BMC Public Health 最近的一项研究发现，美国成年人中适量摄入胆碱可降低动脉粥样硬化性心血管疾病 (ASCVD) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Moderate-choline-intake-lowers-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Moderate-choline-intake-lowers-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39bb3438-c644-413d-b91d-41f4060ba0c3 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 20:35:00 -0400 Moderate choline intake lowers heart disease risk
新型联合治疗对 EGFR NSCLC 患者的疗效优于标准治疗抗体amivantamab和lazertinib（一种靶向EGFR的药物）的组合，与标准治疗相比，对于具有EGFR基因突变的晚期或转移性非小细胞肺癌患者显示出更好的临床益处，这些患者也表现出以下不良预后标志物之一：脑和/或肝转移、p53基因共突变或循环肿瘤DNA的存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Novel-combination-treatment-outperforms-standard-therapy-in-患者-with-EGFR-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Novel-combination-treatment-outperforms-standard-therapy-in-患者-with-EGFR-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6029c0d-a311-48fd-ab71-fbfb8dea030d Tue, 04 Jun 2024 15:46:35 -0400 Novel combination treatment outperforms standard therapy in patients with EGFR NSCLC
GSA-MiXeR：提高我们对遗传性状和疾病了解的强大工具奥斯陆大学的研究人员开发了一种创新工具，有望增进我们对人类遗传特征和疾病的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/GSA-MiXeR-A-powerful-tool-to-improve-our-understanding-of-heritable-traits-and-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/GSA-MiXeR-A-powerful-tool-to-improve-our-understanding-of-heritable-traits-and-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e594a68-e0a6-4332-9dc1-4607277e47fc Tue, 04 Jun 2024 15:26:00 -0400 GSA-MiXeR: A powerful tool to improve our understanding of heritable traits and diseases
新型小分子口服抗病毒药物可能会改变未来抗击流行病的游戏规则Obeldesivir (GS-5245) 是一种新型在研小分子口服抗病毒药物，代表了为应对未来大流行而持续努力的一种新工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Novel-small-molecule-oral-antiviral-could-be-a-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-future-pandemics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Novel-small-molecule-oral-antiviral-could-be-a-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-future-pandemics.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28f52702-c572-4285-a1fb-63f3ed57ff03 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 15:17:43 -0400 Novel small molecule oral antiviral could be a game-changer in the fight against future pandemics
